verbs.description: [V: halloween] [ARG1: happenings] in hillsboro safe trick or treating options costume shops and even a haunted house highlight a few things around town this halloween so carve a pumpkin or make your costume and get ready for the scariest night of the year tanasbourne town center hillsboro oregon shute park aquatic recreation center halloween hillsboro farmers glencoe high school hillsboro oregon sunset esplanade tanasbourne village radio disney hillsboro orenco station
